word: \n     The Lord requires that we return to him, in tithes and offerings, a portion of the goods he has lent us. He accepts these offerings as an act of humble obedience on our part, and a grateful acknowledgment of our indebtedness to him for all the blessings we enjoy. Then let us offer willingly, saying, with David, \"All things come of thee, and of thine own have we given thee.\" Withholding more than is meet tends to poverty.
